articles.author: James Robson
articles.title: England 2-1 Denmark: Harry Kane scores extra-time winner at Wembley to send Three Lions into Euros final - Evening Standard
articles.description: Harry Kane’s extra-time strike secured England a place in Sunday’s European Championship Final with a 2-1 win against Denmark.
articles.content:
Harry Kanes extra-time strike secured England a place in Sundays European Championship Final with a 2-1 win against Denmark.

articles.title: Australia depends on European Union for Pfizer vaccines as the US limits supply - Time Bulletin

articles.title: EU: Fully vaccinated persons allowed entry in principle - The Star Online
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR: Anyone who has received full doses of Covid-19 vaccines authorised by member countries are allowed entry, says the European Union (EU).
